ca.ualberta.cs.team07recipefinder
Class NewRecipeActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.ualberta.cs.team07recipefinder.NewRecipeActivity

public class NewRecipeActivity
extends Activity

The NewRecipeActvity displays EditTexts for the user to enter a recipe title, description, ingredients list, and directions. If the user fills in every EditText then hits the 'done' button, a new Recipe is written to the user's database with the entered information.

Author:
Adam St. Arnaud
